\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 67233}

\subsection*{Was an Amazing Experience}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Epyon}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 10 mg & oral & Pharms - Dronabinol & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:30 & 2.5 mg & oral & Pharms - Dronabinol & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 140.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
So I have taken Marinol a couple of times recently. I keep hearing people say its not that good compared to weed.



11:00 pm - I took 10mg on an empty stomach.



11:30 pm - I felt a little high so I took another.



11:45 pm - Holy crap I was high. It was amazing. The high was better than any I had from smoking and I didnt smell like pot, which I thought was a great plus.



12:00 am - I  got incredibly hungry and the worst dry mouth ever.



My high lasted until around 2 or 3. Was an amazing experience.

\end{document}
